Title: Changing your guitar strings
Summary: Something every guitar player needs to be comfortable with, regardless of level

Articles.Title: A single article test
Articles.Caption: Just testing this out with a single article

Title: The 5 Basic Chord Forms
Summary: Cowboy Chords! A right of passage for any new player

Articles.Title: A double article test
Articles.Caption: Just testing this out with two separate articles

Articles.Title: Part of the double article test
Articles.Caption: Gotta have a second article for a two article test

Title: Welcome to the Guitar!
Summary: Explanation of basic parts of a guitar, including string names and tuning

Videos.Title: Beginner's Guide To Electric Guitar Gear - Guitars, Amps & Pedals
Videos.Caption: This video from Andy Guitar does a great job of breaking down differences between electric and acoustic guitars, demoing different guitars, explaining the basics of amplifiers & pedals, and much more.

Videos.Title: The Beginner's Guide To Electric Guitar Gear - Guitars, Amps & Pedals
Videos.Caption: Rob Chapman is easily one of my favorite 'Guitar Celebrities'. His solo videos (like this one) and his product reviews for Andertons UK with 'The Captain' are nothing short of epic. In this video, Rob breaks down guitars, amps, and pedals for the beginning player. Rob is a phenomenal player, so pay attention, as much can be learned from him. You can certainly expect to see more of his videos in these courses.

Videos.Title: 10 Best Electric Guitars for Beginners 2017
Videos.Caption: This is a nice comprehensive look at the best electric guitars for beginners, and it was done in 2017, so the options are very recent. As you'll soon discover on your guitar journey, guitars can get VERY expensive, but don't worry - today's affordable options for beginners are better than ever. Even if your budget is less than $100, you'll be able to find something to get started on, and more options will be available for literally every budget moving forward.

Videos.Title: 7 Cheap Electric Guitars That Don't Suck - Great Tone at Budget Friendly Prices
Videos.Caption: Here's one more comprehensive look at affordable options for getting started on the electric guitar. The main point to get here is that there are plenty of options for getting started, and the quality of these beginner guitars is better today than it was for previous generations of beginning players (except those that were starting in the 50's and 60's). Anything you see here should be considered a viable option for getting started on the guitar.

Articles.Title: 8 tips on how to buy your first electric guitar
Articles.Caption: Another beginners buying guide, although this one is different from the others in this lesson. This isn't about comparing specific guitars, but instead is more of a general checklist to keep in mind when making your purchasing decision. A quick easy read that you should definitely check out.

Articles.Title: Electric Guitar vs. Acoustic Guitar - Which is Better for Beginners?
Articles.Caption: If you're not sure which type of guitar you want to get started on, then this article is for you. Here you'll find pros and cons for starting on acoustic versus electric. Just remember, you can always play both, so don't worry about which one you start out on. It's just the first step of a (hopefully) long journey.

Articles.Title: Parts of an Electric Guitar
Articles.Caption: A nice breakdown of the parts of an electric guitar. Intended for the beginning player, this article explains everything you need to know about the components found on an electric guitar.

Articles.Title: For Those About to Rock: 10 Beginner FAQs
Articles.Caption: Fender provides answers to 10 common questions asked by beginning guitar players, or those who are interested in getting started but haven't committed quite yet.

Articles.Title: What Is The Best Beginner Electric Guitar? Ultimate Buying Guide To Your First Instrument!
Articles.Caption: Guitar Fella breaks down their top list of guitars for beginners. Plenty of great options to consider in here.

Articles.Title: 10 Essential Principles for Learning Guitar
Articles.Caption: A nice collection of tips to keep in mind when learning to play the guitar. The advice you'll find in this article should stick with you for your entire playing career, as these are principles you never grow out of.
